name: bozo Hybrid
description: Inventors of Hybrid Defi. Absolutely not a cult. Alchemical crypto legends. Tokenomics are exothermic. Taste the shamanic brew of bozoyauscha Hybridio. BozoHYBRID introduced the revolutionary NFTxTOKEN hybrid model, transforming the crypto landscape with Hybrid DeFi. We’ve unified the NFT and token markets into one cohesive ecosystem, creating the first deflationary NFTs in history. Solved the escrow trust issue of OTC? Check. Eradicated whale slippage? Double check. NFT DCA capability? Triple check. Building never stops - now any SPL token can hybridize effortlessly without diluting the community or ecosystem. It's user-friendly and flawlessly combines DeFi with NFTs, bringing PFPs to token projects. Reach out to us at GoHybrid or via the bozoHYBRID Twitter to create a generative NFT collection, or try it yourself with a static collection. bozoHYBRID currently consists of 800m tokens intrinsically tied to two Hybrid NFT collections without dilution. The Gold Bricks, representing 0.1% of the supply, and the Gold Nuggets representing 0.01% of the supply. Ask us how. A bunch of bozos invented this. » No premine to dump on you » No VCs to dump on you » No pre-salers to dump on you » No insiders to dump on you » No influencers paid to dump on you » No airdroppers to dump on you Completely free and fair launch.
